name: Spiritduality
description:
Spiritduality - by Brad Askew (GameDev.TV Game Jam 2022)

Spiritduality is a game based on the theme: "Death is only the beginning". In this game, you are tasked with protecting your town from the invasion of spirits seeking to possess everyone. 

You will use your psychic powers to destroy the ghosts. You can only attack them (and be attacked) when in the Astral Realm. However, being in the Astral Realm will deplete your energy. When you defeat a spirit, you can collect residual energy to help replenish your own.

You must defeat all the spirits before they possess everyone!
